entries.name: Map
entries.description:
The map for the game to run on.

Valid map names:
* TheIsland_WP

entries.name: Port
entries.description: Specifies the UDP Game Port.

entries.name: ActiveEvent
entries.description: Enables a specified event or enables the event's colours palette on wild creatures. Only one can be specified and active at a time.

entries.name: AllowFlyerSpeedLeveling
entries.description: Enables Level Up for Flyer Movement Speed. Note: alternatively, it can be enabled adding bAllowFlyerSpeedLeveling=True to the Game.ini file.

entries.name: AltSaveDirectoryName
entries.description: Allows to specify a custom directory name for server world-save. Usually used to manage clusters.

entries.name: serverkey
entries.description: ServerAPI ONLY - Changes the map name used by plugins

entries.name: oldconsole
entries.description: Use the old-style console window rather than the new graphical one

entries.name: additionalOptions
entries.description: Additional options for the command-line.  MapUrl options should start with ?, and command-line switches should start with -. If you find yourself frequently using this option, please let the ASMA team know so we can add a real option for it.

entries.name: MULTIHOME
entries.description: Specifies the MultiHome IP Address.

entries.name: ip
entries.description: Option found in Nitrado server setup. Expected to work in a -MULTIHOME context. Undocumented by Wildcard.

entries.name: ServerIP
entries.description: Option found in Nitrado server setup. Expected to work in a -MULTIHOME context. Undocumented by Wildcard.

entries.name: AutoDestroyStructures
entries.description: Enables auto destruction of old structures. Timer can be adjusted with AutoDestroyOldStructuresMultiplier.

entries.name: culture
entries.description: Overrides the server output language. It doesn't override clients' language. List of currently supported language codes: ca, cs, da, de, en, es, eu, fi, fr, hu, it, ja, ka, ko, nl, pl, pt_BR, ru, sv, th, tr, zh, zh-Hans-CN, zh-TW.

entries.name: DisableCustomFoldersInTributeInventories
entries.description: Disables creation of folders in Tribute inventories.

entries.name: DisableRailgunPVP
entries.description: Disable the Tek Railgun on PvP servers (feature currently activated by default on Official servers).

entries.name: EnableIdlePlayerKick
entries.description: Cause characters that have not moved or interacted within the KickIdlePlayersPeriod (GameUserSettings.ini) to be kicked.

entries.name: EventColorsChanceOverride
entries.description: Takes a floating point value between 0 and 1.0 (1 = 100% chance for colour override).

entries.name: ForceAllowCaveFlyers
entries.description: Force flyer creatures to be allowed into caves (Flyers able to go into caves by default on custom maps).

entries.name: ForceRespawnDinos
entries.description: Launch with this command to destroy all wild creatures on server start-up. Note: this will only destroy wild creatures that are NOT currently tamed.

entries.name: imprintlimit
entries.description: Automatically destroys creatures exceeding the imprinting bonus limit specified, in %. It is recommended going 1% higher (101) to catch potential floating-point errors, especially when working with custom imprinting rates.

entries.name: insecure
entries.description: Disable Valve Anti-Cheat (VAC) system.

entries.name: MaxNumOfSaveBackups
entries.description: Set the max number of backup to keeps in the save folder. Whenever a new backup is created, the oldest ones will be deleted. Default value is 20. Since such backups take place every 2 hours and they are uncomprssed files, it is suggested to use more flexible third party solutions, especially with "big" saves.

entries.name: MinimumTimeBetweenInventoryRetrieval
entries.description: Fjordhawk cool-down on retrieval of player's inventory when killed. Defaults to 1 hour.

entries.name: mods
entries.description: Specify CurseForge Mod Project IDs.

entries.name: noantispeedhack
entries.description: Anti speedhack detection is now enabled by default — you now use this option to disable it.

entries.name: NoBattlEye
entries.description: Run server without BattleEye.

entries.name: nocombineclientmoves
entries.description: Server player move physics optimization is now enabled by default (improves performance) — to disable it, use this server option.

entries.name: nodinos
entries.description: Prevents wild creatures from being spawned. Note: you need to wipe wild creatures (cheat destroywilddinos) after adding this on a not fresh server.

entries.name: NoHangDetection
entries.description: Prevents the server from shutdown if its start-time takes more than 2700 seconds (45 minutes). Useful for servers with big saves or very slow machines. Note: this will disabled further server hangs detection.

entries.name: NotifyAdminCommandsInChat
entries.description: Displays cheat and admincheat commands to admin players only in the global chat. Not to be confused with AdminLogging which displays such commands to all players.

entries.name: noundermeshchecking
entries.description: Will turn off the anti-meshing system entirely.

entries.name: noundermeshkilling
entries.description: Will turn off the anti-meshing player kills (but still allow teleporting).

entries.name: pvedisallowtribewar
entries.description: Prevents tribes in PvE mode to officially declare war on each other for mutually-agreed-upon period of time. Alternatively, it is possible to use the Game.ini bPvEAllowTribeWar.

entries.name: SecureSendArKPayload
entries.description: Add this option to protect against the creature upload issue. Note: be aware this may have an impact on some mods.

entries.name: servergamelog
entries.description: Enable server admin logs (including support in the RCON). Use RCON command getgamelog to print 100 entries at a time. Also, outputs to dated file in Logs, adjust max length of the RCON buffer with the option RCONServerGameLogBuffer=600.

entries.name: servergamelogincludetribelogs
entries.description: Include tribe logs in the normal game logs. Note that this is required to get the logs from RCON (using -ServerRCONOutputTribeLogs). Additionally, it will display them in the application's console.

entries.name: ServerRCONOutputTribeLogs
entries.description: Allows tribe chat to be displayed in the RCON, in addition to global chat. Requires -servergamelogincludetribelogs

entries.name: speedhackbias
entries.description: Bias you can use on your server (can cause more rubber banding on laggy players). Defaults to 1.0, you can launch with it such as: -speedhackbias=0.25f.

entries.name: StasisKeepControllers
entries.description: AI Controllers to once again be destroyed on Stasis, too much memory overhead to keeping them around on large maps. For servers with a lot of RAM, they can now optionally gain performance by running with this to keep the AI in memory.

entries.name: structurememopts
entries.description: Enables structure memory optimizations. Note: avoid using it when running structure-related mods (until they get updated) as it can break the snap points of these mod structures.

entries.name: UseDynamicConfig
entries.description: Enables the use of the dynamic config, if you don't provide a CustomDynamicConfigUrl the server will use the default dynamic config for that platform (the one used on official server). Note: unless you force an immediate update using the ForceUpdateDynamicConfig command, the configuration is checked every time the world is (auto)saved. When you want to "undo" the config you should be changing it back to whatever your default is, so it can be read from the updated config and thus applied. Omitting any lines will not update those options.

entries.name: UseItemDupeCheck
entries.description: Enables additional dupe protection. Note: this could have an impact on mods, so use with caution.

entries.name: UseSecureSpawnRules
entries.description: Fixes an issue that would cause unofficial servers to crash when using certain mods. The affected mods should work now and unofficials can opt-in to the more secure item/dino spawning rules. Note: this could have an impact on mods, so use with caution.

entries.name: usestore
entries.description: Same basic behaviour of official (non-legacy) servers on handling player characters data: character profile file (.arkprofile) is not saved separately from map save (.ark), nor its backup. When necessary (e.g.: a character just transferred or a new character has been created) a temporary character profile file is created and kept until next world-save. Tribe profiles are stored in a different format (.arktributetribe). Allows -BackupTransferPlayerDatas option (for fully mimic official servers save behaviour). Use the option -converttostore to convert previous non stored data to stored data. This option must be used to correctly load the Official 2023 Server saves backups along with -newsaveformat.

entries.name: UseStructureStasisGrid
entries.description: Enables the structure stasis grid to improve server performance on large bases with lots of players[1].

entries.name: UseVivox
entries.description: nables Vivox on Steam only servers. Default for EPIC servers but can be enabled for Steam server.

entries.name: webalarm
entries.description: Activate Web alarms when important things happen to a tribe, such as Tripwire Alarms going off and Babies being born.

entries.name: GBUsageToForceRestart
entries.description: Enabled an out of memory protection for servers. In the event that a server reaches an excessive amount of memory, the world will be forced saved and the server will be restarted to prevent crashes or rollbacks. Setting it to 0 disables.

entries.name: WinLiveMaxPlayers
entries.description: Sets the maximum of players for the server. This currently overrides the MaxPlayers setting from the GameUserSettings.ini option, otherwise defaults to 70.

entries.name: ServerPlatform
entries.description: Allows the server to accept specified platforms. Options are PC for Steam, PS5 for PlayStation 5, XSX for XBOX, WINGDK for Microsoft Store, ALL for crossplay between PC and all consoles. Note: Steam dedicated server supports only PC and ALL options.

entries.name: pconlymods
entries.description: Activate PC only mods.

entries.name: AlwaysTickDedicatedSkeletalMeshes
entries.description: Disables optimization to dynamically not tick idle/inactive creature animations on the dedicated server based on server frame rate (only becomes active when server is low FPS). Note: side-effects can include inaccurate collisions for idle creatures on the client versus the server (such as inaccurate jumping position while standing on an inactive/idle Brontosaurus and jumping on its tail as it sits in your base).

entries.name: NoWildBabies
entries.description: Disables spawning of wild babies.

entries.name: CustomNotificationURL
entries.description: Allows server custom notification broadcast using the server message feature. Used in official clusters (e.g.: http://arkdedicated.com/pcnotification.html). Undocumented bye Wildcard.

entries.name: ActiveMapMod
entries.description: Specifies which mod map is loaded.

entries.name: AdminLogging
entries.description: If True, logs all admin commands to in-game chat.

entries.name: AdminListURL
entries.description: Sets the global admin list. Must be enclosed in double quotes.

entries.name: AllowAnyoneBabyImprintCuddle
entries.description: If True, allows anyone to "take care" of a baby creatures (cuddle etc.), not just whomever imprinted on it.

entries.name: AllowCaveBuildingPvE
entries.description: If True, allows building in caves when PvE mode is also enabled. Note: no more working in command-line options before patch 241.5.

entries.name: AllowFlyerCarryPvE
entries.description: If True, allows flying dinosaurs to pick up wild creatures in PvE.

entries.name: AllowHideDamageSourceFromLogs
entries.description: If False, shows the damage sources in tribe logs.

entries.name: AllowHitMarkers
entries.description: If False, disables optional markers for ranged attacks.

entries.name: AllowMultipleAttachedC4
entries.description: If True, allows to attach more than one C4 per creature.

entries.name: AllowRaidDinoFeeding
entries.description: If True, allows Titanosaurs to be permanently tamed (namely allow them to be fed). Note: in The Island only spawns a maximum of 3 Titanosaurs, so 3 tamed ones should ultimately block any more ones from spawning.

entries.name: AllowThirdPersonPlayer
entries.description: If False, disables third person camera allowed by default on all dedicated servers.

entries.name: AlwaysAllowStructurePickup
entries.description: If True disables the timer on the quick pick-up system.

entries.name: AutoSavePeriodMinutes
entries.description: Set interval for automatic saves. Setting this to 0 will cause constant saving.

entries.name: ClampItemSpoilingTimes
entries.description: If True, clamps all spoiling times to the items' maximum spoiling times. Useful if any infinite-spoiling exploits were used on the server and you wish to clean them up. Could potentially cause issues with mods that alter spoiling time, hence it is an option.

entries.name: ClampItemStats
entries.description: If True, enables stats clamping for items.

entries.name: ClampResourceHarvestDamage
entries.description: If True, limit the damage caused by a tame to a resource on harvesting based on resource remaining health.

entries.name: CustomDynamicConfigUrl
entries.description: Direct link to a live dynamicconfig.ini file, allowing live changes of the supported options without the need of server restart, as well defining custom colour set for wild creatures' spawns. Note: requires -UseDynamicConfig command line option.

entries.name: DayCycleSpeedScale
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the passage of time in the ARK, controlling how often day changes to night and night changes to day. The default value 1 provides the same cycle speed as the single player experience (and the official public servers). Values lower than 1 slow down the cycle; higher values accelerate it. Base time when value is 1 appears to be 1-minute real time equals approx. 28-minutes game time. Thus, for an approximate 24-hour day/night cycle in game, use .035 for the value.

entries.name: DayTimeSpeedScale
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the passage of time in the ARK during the day. This value determines the length of each day, relative to the length of each night (as specified by NightTimeSpeedScale). Lowering this value increases the length of each day.

entries.name: DifficultyOffset
entries.description: Specifies the difficulty level.

entries.name: DinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for dinosaurs' food consumption. Higher values increase food consumption (dinosaurs get hungry faster). It also affects the taming-times.

entries.name: DinoCharacterHealthRecoveryMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for dinosaurs' health recovery. Higher values increase the recovery rate (dinosaurs heal faster).

entries.name: DinoCharacterStaminaDrainMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for dinosaurs' stamina consumption. Higher values increase stamina consumption (dinosaurs get tired faster).

entries.name: DinoDamageMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the damage wild dinosaurs deal with their attacks. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values increase damage. Lower values decrease it.

entries.name: DinoResistanceMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the resistance to damage wild dinosaurs receive when attacked. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values decrease resistance, increasing damage per attack. Lower values increase it, reducing damage per attack. A value of 0.5 results in a creature taking half damage while a value of 2.0 would result in a creature taking double normal damage.

entries.name: DisableDinoDecayPvE
entries.description: If True, disables the creature decay in PvE mode. Note: after patch 273.691, in PvE mode the dino auto-unclaim after decay period has been disabled.

entries.name: DisableImprintDinoBuff
entries.description: If True, disables the creature imprinting player Stat Bonus. Where whomever specifically imprinted on the creature, and raised it to have an Imprinting Quality, gets extra Damage/Resistance buff.

entries.name: DisablePvEGamma
entries.description: If True, prevents use of console command "gamma" in PvE mode.

entries.name: DisableStructureDecayPvE
entries.description: If True, disables the gradual auto-decay of player structures.

entries.name: DisableWeatherFog
entries.description: If True, disables fog.

entries.name: DontAlwaysNotifyPlayerJoined
entries.description: If True, globally disables player joins notifications.

entries.name: EnableExtraStructurePreventionVolumes
entries.description: f True, disables building in specific resource-rich areas, in particular setup on The Island around the major mountains.

entries.name: EnablePvPGamma
entries.description: If True, allows use of console command "gamma" in PvP mode.

entries.name: globalVoiceChat
entries.description: If True, voice chat turns global.

entries.name: HarvestAmountMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for yields from all harvesting activities (chopping down trees, picking berries, carving carcasses, mining rocks, etc.). Higher values increase the amount of materials harvested with each strike.

entries.name: HarvestHealthMultiplier
entries.description: pecifies the scaling factor for the "health" of items that can be harvested (trees, rocks, carcasses, etc.). Higher values increase the amount of damage (i.e., "number of strikes") such objects can withstand before being destroyed, which results in higher overall harvest yields.

entries.name: ItemStackSizeMultiplier
entries.description: Allow increasing or decreasing global item stack size, this means all default stack sizes will be multiplied by the value given (excluding items that have a stack size of 1 by default).

entries.name: KickIdlePlayersPeriod
entries.description: Time in seconds after which characters that have not moved or interacted will be kicked (if -EnableIdlePlayerKick as command line parameter is set). Note: although at code level it is defined as a floating-point number, it is suggested to use an integer instead.

entries.name: MaxPersonalTamedDinos
entries.description: Sets a per-tribe creature tame limit (500 on official PvE servers, 300 in official PvP servers). The default value of 0 disables such limit.

entries.name: MaxTamedDinos
entries.description: Sets the maximum number of tamed Dinos on a Server, this is a global cap. Note: although at code level it is defined as a floating-point number, it is suggested to use an integer instead.

entries.name: MaxTributeItems
entries.description: Slots for uploaded items and resources. Any value less than default will be reverted. Note: Some player claimed maximum 154 to be safe cap and more will corrupt profile/cluster and lead to lose of all stored items and resources but it need to be checked

entries.name: NightTimeSpeedScale
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the passage of time in the ARK during night time. This value determines the length of each night, relative to the length of each day (as specified by DayTimeSpeedScale) Lowering this value increases the length of each night.

entries.name: NonPermanentDiseases
entries.description: If True, makes permanent diseases not permanent. Players will lose them if on re-spawn.

entries.name: OverrideOfficialDifficulty
entries.description: Allows you to override the default server difficulty level of 4 with 5 to match the new official server difficulty level. Default value of 0.0 disables the override. A value of 5.0 will allow common creatures to spawn up to level 150. Originally (247.95) available only as command line option.

entries.name: OverrideStructurePlatformPrevention
entries.description: If True, turrets becomes be buildable and functional on platform saddles. Since 247.999 applies on spike structure too. Note: despite patch notes, in ShooterGameServer it's coded OverrideStructurePlatformPrevention with two r.

entries.name: OxygenSwimSpeedStatMultiplier
entries.description: Use this to set how swim speed is multiplied by level spent in oxygen. The value was reduced by 80% in 256.0.

entries.name: PerPlatformMaxStructuresMultiplier
entries.description: Higher value increases (from a percentage scale) max number of items place-able on saddles and rafts.

entries.name: PlatformSaddleBuildAreaBoundsMultiplier
entries.description: Increasing the number allows structures being placed further away from the platform.Increasing the number allows structures being placed further away from the platform.

entries.name: PlayerCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for player characters' food consumption. Higher values increase food consumption (player characters get hungry faster).

entries.name: PlayerCharacterHealthRecoveryMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for player characters' health recovery. Higher values increase the recovery rate (player characters heal faster).

entries.name: PlayerCharacterStaminaDrainMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for player characters' stamina consumption. Higher values increase stamina consumption (player characters get tired faster).

entries.name: PlayerCharacterWaterDrainMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for player characters' water consumption. Higher values increase water consumption (player characters get thirsty faster).

entries.name: PlayerDamageMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the damage players deal with their attacks. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values increase damage. Lower values decrease it.

entries.name: PlayerResistanceMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the resistance to damage players receive when attacked. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values decrease resistance, increasing damage per attack. Lower values increase it, reducing damage per attack. A value of 0.5 results in a player taking half damage while a value of 2.0 would result in taking double normal damage.

entries.name: PreventDiseases
entries.description: f True, completely diseases on the server. Thus far just Swamp Fever.

entries.name: PreventMateBoost
entries.description: f True, disables creature mate boosting.

entries.name: PreventOfflinePvP
entries.description: If True, enables the Offline Raiding Prevention (ORP). When all tribe members are logged off, tribe characters, creature and structures become invulnerable. Creature starvation still applies, moreover, characters and creature can still die if drowned. Despite the name, it works on both PvE and PvP game modes. Due to performance reason, it is recommended to set a minimum interval with PreventOfflinePvPInterval option before ORP becomes active. ORP also helps lowering memory and CPU usage on a server. Enabled by default on Official PvE since 258.3

entries.name: PreventOfflinePvPInterval
entries.description: Seconds to wait before a ORP becomes active for tribe/players and relative creatures/structures (10 seconds in official PvE servers). Note: although at code level it is defined as a floating-point number, it is suggested to use an integer instead.

entries.name: PreventSpawnAnimations
entries.description: If True, player characters (re)spawn without the wake-up animation.

entries.name: PreventTribeAlliances
entries.description: If True, prevents tribes from creating Alliances.

entries.name: ProximityChat
entries.description: If True, only players near each other can see their chat messages

entries.name: PvEAllowStructuresAtSupplyDrops
entries.description: If True, allows building near supply drop points in PvE mode.

entries.name: PvEDinoDecayPeriodMultiplier
entries.description: Creature PvE auto-decay time multiplier. Requires DisableDinoDecayPvE=false in GameUserSettings.ini or ?DisableDinoDecayPvE=false in command line to work.

entries.name: PvPDinoDecay
entries.description: If True, enables creatures' decay in PvP while the Offline Raid Prevention is active.

entries.name: RaidDinoCharacterFoodDrainMultiplier
entries.description: Affects how quickly the food drains on such "Raid Dinos" (e.g.: Titanosaurus)

entries.name: SupplyCrateLootQualityMultiplier
entries.description: Increases the quality of items that have a quality in the supply crates. Valid values are from 1.0 to 5.0. The quality also depends on the Difficulty Offset.

entries.name: FishingLootQualityMultiplier
entries.description: Sets the quality of items that have a quality when fishing. Valid values are from 1.0 to 5.0.

entries.name: RandomSupplyCratePoints
entries.description: If True, supply drops are in random locations. Note: This setting is known to cause artifacts becoming inaccessible on Ragnarok if active.

entries.name: RCONPort
entries.description: Specifies the optional TCP RCON Port.

entries.name: RCONEnabled
entries.description: Enables the RCON feature.  You probably also want to set the RCONPort and ServerAdminPassword settings if you enable this.

entries.name: RCONServerGameLogBuffer
entries.description: Determines how many lines of game logs are send over the RCON. Note: despite being coded as a float it's suggested to treat it as integer.

entries.name: ResourcesRespawnPeriodMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the re-spawn rate for resource nodes (trees, rocks, bushes, etc.). Lower values cause nodes to re-spawn more frequently.

entries.name: ServerAdminPassword
entries.description: If specified, players must provide this password (via the in-game console) to gain access to administrator commands on the server. Note: no quotes are used.

entries.name: ServerCrosshair
entries.description: If False, disables the Crosshair on your server.

entries.name: ServerForceNoHUD
entries.description: If True, HUD is always disabled for non-tribe owned NPCs.

entries.name: ServerHardcore
entries.description: If True, enables Hardcore mode (player characters revert to level 1 upon death)

entries.name: ServerPassword
entries.description: If specified, players must provide this password to join the server. Note: no quotes are used.

entries.name: serverPVE
entries.description: If True, disables PvP and enables PvE

entries.name: ShowFloatingDamageText
entries.description: If True, enables RPG-style popup damage text mode.

entries.name: ShowMapPlayerLocation
entries.description: If False, hides each player their own precise position when they view their map.

entries.name: StructurePickupHoldDuration
entries.description: Specifies the quick pick-up hold duration, a value of 0 results in instant pick-up.

entries.name: StructurePickupTimeAfterPlacement
entries.description: Amount of time in seconds after placement that quick pick-up is available.

entries.name: StructurePreventResourceRadiusMultiplier
entries.description: Same as ResourceNoReplenishRadiusStructures in Game.ini. If both settings are set both multiplier will be applied. Can be useful when cannot change the Game.ini file as it works as a command line option too.

entries.name: StructureResistanceMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the resistance to damage structures receive when attacked. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values decrease resistance, increasing damage per attack. Lower values increase it, reducing damage per attack. A value of 0.5 results in a structure taking half damage while a value of 2.0 would result in a structure taking double normal damage.

entries.name: TamingSpeedMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for dinosaur taming speed. Higher values make taming faster.

entries.name: TheMaxStructuresInRange
entries.description: Specifies the maximum number of structures that can be constructed within a certain (currently hard-coded) range. Replaces the old value NewMaxStructuresInRange

entries.name: TribeNameChangeCooldown
entries.description: Cool-down, in minutes, in between tribe name changes. Official server use a value of 172800.0 (2 days).

entries.name: XPMultiplier
entries.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the experience received by players, tribes and dinosaurs for various actions. The default value 1 provides the same amounts of experience as in the single player experience (and official public servers). Higher values increase XP amounts awarded for various actions; lower values decrease .it. In 313.5 an additional hardcoded multiplier of 4 was activated

entries.name: noTributeDownloads
entries.description: If True, prevents CrossArk-data downloads in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

entries.name: PreventDownloadDinos
entries.description: If True, prevents creatures download from ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

entries.name: PreventDownloadItems
entries.description: If True, prevents items download from ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

entries.name: PreventDownloadSurvivors
entries.description: If True, prevents survivors download from ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

entries.name: PreventUploadDinos
entries.description: If True, prevents creatures upload to ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

entries.name: PreventUploadItems
entries.description: If True, prevents items upload to ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

entries.name: PreventUploadSurvivors
entries.description: If True, prevents survivors upload to ARK Data in Cross-ARK Data Transfer.

entries.name: DisableCryopodEnemyCheck
entries.description: If True, will ignore the enemy player/structure/dino checks.

entries.name: AllowCryoFridgeOnSaddle
entries.description: If True, will allow Cryofridge to be placed on rafts/saddles.

entries.name: DisableCryopodFridgeRequirement
entries.description: If True, will disable the Cryofridge requirement for releasing cryopodded dinos.

entries.name: DestroyTamesOverTheSoftTameLimit
entries.description: If True, enables destroying tames over the limit, default is false.

entries.name: MaxTamedDinos_SoftTameLimit
entries.description: Set the server-wide soft tame limit.

entries.name: MaxTamedDinos_SoftTameLimit_CountdownForDeletionDuration
entries.description: Set the timer for destroy in seconds.

entries.name: SessionName
entries.description: Specifies the Server name advertised in the Game Server Browser as well in Steam Server browser. If no name is provide, the default name will be ARK # followed by a random 6 digit number. Note: Name must not be typed between quotes unless it is launched from command line.

entries.name: Duration
entries.description: Specifies in seconds the duration of the displayed message on player log-in.

entries.name: Message
entries.description: A single line string for a message displayed to played once logged-in. No quotes needed. Use \n to start a new line in the message.

entries.name: bDisableStructurePlacementCollision
entries.description: If True, allows for structures to clip into the terrain.

entries.name: BabyCuddleGracePeriodMultiplier
entries.description: Scales how long after delaying cuddling with the Baby before Imprinting Quality starts to decrease.

entries.name: BabyCuddleIntervalMultiplier
entries.description: Scales how often babies needs attention for imprinting. More often means you'll need to cuddle with them more frequently to gain Imprinting Quality. Scales according to BabyMatureSpeedMultiplier: if both set at 1.0 the imprint request is every 8 hours.

entries.name: BabyCuddleLoseImprintQualitySpeedMultiplier
entries.description: Scales how fast Imprinting Quality decreases after the grace period if you haven't yet cuddled with the Baby.

entries.name: BabyFoodConsumptionSpeedMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the speed that baby dinos eat their food. A lower value decreases (by percentage) the food eaten by babies.

entries.name: BabyImprintAmountMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the percentage each imprint provides. For example, if an imprint usually give 10%, setting this multiplier to 0.5 means they would now give 5% each. While setting it to 2.0 means they would now give 20% each, etc. This multiplier is global, meaning it will affect the imprinting progression of every species.

entries.name: BabyImprintingStatScaleMultiplier
entries.description: Scales how much of an effect on stats the Imprinting Quality has. Set it to 0 to effectively disable the system.

entries.name: BabyMatureSpeedMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the maturation speed of babies. A higher number decreases (by percentage) time needed for baby dino to mature. See Times for Breeding tables for values at 1.0

entries.name: bUseSingleplayerSettings
entries.description: If True, all game settings will be more balanced for an individual player experience. Useful for dedicated server with a very small amount of players. See Single Player Settings section for more details.

entries.name: CraftingSkillBonusMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the bonus received from upgrading the Crafting Skill.

entries.name: CraftXPMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the amount of XP earned for crafting.

entries.name: CropDecaySpeedMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the speed of crop decay in plots. A higher value decrease (by percentage) speed of crop decay in plots.

entries.name: CropGrowthSpeedMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the speed of crop growth in plots. A higher value increases (by percentage) speed of crop growth.

entries.name: CustomRecipeEffectivenessMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the effectiveness of custom recipes. A higher value increases (by percentage) their effectiveness.

entries.name: CustomRecipeSkillMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the effect of the players crafting speed level that is used as a base for the formula in creating a custom recipe. A higher number increases (by percentage) the effect.

entries.name: DestroyTamesOverLevelClamp
entries.description: Tames that exceed that level will be deleted on server start. Official servers have it set to 450.

entries.name: EggHatchSpeedMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the time needed for a fertilised egg to hatch. A higher value decreases (by percentage) that time.

entries.name: GenericXPMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the amount of XP earned for generic XP (automatic over time).

entries.name: GlobalCorpseDecompositionTimeMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the decomposition time of corpses, (player and creature), globally. Higher values prolong the time.

entries.name: GlobalItemDecompositionTimeMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the decomposition time of dropped items, loot bags etc. globally. Higher values prolong the time.

entries.name: GlobalSpoilingTimeMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the spoiling time of perishables globally. Higher values prolong the time.

entries.name: HarvestXPMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the amount of XP earned for harvesting.

entries.name: KillXPMultiplier
entries.description: Scale the amount of XP earned for a kill.

entries.name: LayEggIntervalMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the time between eggs are spawning / being laid. Higher number increases it (by percentage).

entries.name: MatingIntervalMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the interval between tames can mate. A lower value decreases it (on a percentage scale). Example: a value of 0.5 would allow tames to mate 50% sooner.

entries.name: MatingSpeedMultiplier
entries.description: Scales the speed at which tames mate with each other. A higher value increases it (by percentage). Example: MatingSpeedMultiplier=2.0 would cause tames to complete mating in half the normal time.

entries.name: PoopIntervalMultiplier
entries.description: Scales how frequently survivors can poop. Higher value decreases it (by percentage).

entries.name: ResourceNoReplenishRadiusPlayers
entries.description: Controls how resources regrow closer or farther away from players. Values higher than 1.0 increase the distance around players where resources are not allowed to grow back. Values between 0 and 1.0 will reduce it.

entries.name: ResourceNoReplenishRadiusStructures
entries.description: Controls how resources regrow closer or farther away from structures Values higher than 1.0 increase the distance around structures where resources are not allowed to grow back. Values between 0 and 1.0 will reduce it.

entries.name: SpecialXPMultiplier
entries.description: Scale the amount of XP earned for SpecialEvent.

entries.name: bAllowUnlimitedRespecs
entries.description: If True, allows more than one usage of Mindwipe Tonic without 24 hours cooldown.

entries.name: bAllowUnclaimDinos
entries.description: If False, prevents players to unclaim tame creatures.

entries.name: bAllowCustomRecipes
entries.description: If False, disabled custom RP-oriented Recipe/Cooking System (including Skill-Based results).

entries.name: bAllowFlyerSpeedLeveling
entries.description: Specifies whether flyer creatures can have their Movement Speed levelled up.

entries.name: bAllowSpeedLeveling
entries.description: Specifies whether player can have their Movement Speed levelled up.

entries.name: bDisableFriendlyFire
entries.description: If True, prevents Friendly-Fire (among tribe mates/tames/structures).

entries.name: bPvEDisableFriendlyFire
entries.description: If True, disabled Friendly-Fire (among tribe mates/tames/structures) in PvE servers.

entries.name: ConfigAddNPCSpawnEntriesContainer
entries.description: Adds specific creatures in spawn areas.

entries.name: ConfigSubtractNPCSpawnEntriesContainer
entries.description: Removes specific creatures in spawn areas.

entries.name: ConfigOverrideNPCSpawnEntriesContainer
entries.description: Overrides specific creatures in spawn areas.

entries.name: DinoSpawnWeightMultipliers
entries.description: Globally overrides creatures spawns likelihood.

entries.name: NPCReplacements
entries.description: Globally replaces specific creatures with another using class names.

entries.name: DinoClassDamageMultipliers
entries.description: Wild Dino: Multiplies damage dealt of specific dinosaurs via classname. Higher values increase the damage dealt.

entries.name: TamedDinoClassDamageMultipliers
entries.description: Tamed Dino: Multiplies damage dealt of specific dinosaurs via classname. Higher values increase the damage dealt.

entries.name: OverrideEngramEntries
entries.description: Configures the status and requirements for learning an engram, specified by its index.

entries.name: OverrideNamedEngramEntries
entries.description: Configures the status and requirements for learning an engram, specified by its name.

entries.name: EngramEntryAutoUnlocks
entries.description: Automatically unlocks the specified Engram when reaching the level specified.

entries.name: ConfigOverrideItemCraftingCosts
entries.description: Overrides items crafting resource requirements.

entries.name: ConfigOverrideItemMaxQuantity
entries.description: Overrides items stack size on a per-item basis.

entries.name: ConfigOverrideSupplyCrateItems
entries.description: Overrides items contained in loot crates.

entries.name: ItemStatClamps
entries.description: Globally clamps item stats. Requires ?ClampItemStats=true option in the command line.

entries.name: PlayerBaseStatMultipliers
entries.description: Changes the base stats of a player by multiplying with the default value. Meaning the start stats of a new spawned character.

entries.name: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoTamed
entries.description: Scales tamed creature stats.

entries.name: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_DinoWild
entries.description: Scales wild creatures stats.

entries.name: PerLevelStatsMultiplier_Player
entries.description: Scales Player stats.
